title: 1.2.5加载MOD，各种弹出
author: chd19972011
txt_content:
WELL,今天玩那个超大合集，电脑卡死，所以想自己弄，结果只弄了一个MOD，我就弹出了。武器MOD，不要怀疑我没有看那个帖子，也不要怀疑我没有把ModLoader装好。就请问什么问题，怎么样可以解决，谢谢大家了，我弄了整整一天啊。

    Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; ModLoader has failed to initialize.
This error has been saved to F:\我的世界\1.3.1\Minecraft-1.3\Minecraft-1.3\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2012-08-15_16.02.09-client.txt for your convenience. Please include a copy of this file if you report this crash to anyone.

Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: EntityGrendelAmmo
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)

replies.author: sylqiuyifeng
replies.txt_content:
额……
看不出是啥错误……

replies.author: chd19972011
replies.txt_content: 没人么？大家来帮帮忙啊

replies.author: chd19972011
replies.txt_content: 不是吧，那这玩意怎么解决。。。难道我只能玩没有MOD的了？
